title: Traxman Announces New Album Da Mind of Traxman Vol.3, Shares Song: Listen
description: “I Want U to Ghost” leads the producer’s first album for Planet Mu in a decade, mixed and overseen by the label’s Sinjin Hawke
author: Jazz Monroe

html:
“I Want U to Ghost” leads the producer’s first album for Planet Mu in a decade, mixed and overseen by the label’s Sinjin Hawke

Traxman has announced Da Mind of Traxman Vol.3, a new album mixed and overseen by Planet Mu artist Sinjin Hawke, marking Traxman’s first record for the label in a decade. Hawke helped whittle down the tracklist, which you can see below, from a selection of hundreds of tracks dating back to 2005. Listen to one of them, “I Want U to Ghost,” below, ahead of the album’s release on February 7.

Read Pitchfork’s reviews of Da Mind of Traxman and Da Mind of Traxman, Vol.2.

Da Mind of Traxman Vol.3:

01 Kill da DJ [ft. Bobby Skillz and Sinjin Hawke]
02 Trax da Prophet
03 I Want U to Ghost
04 Where They At [ft. DJ Twan]
05 House of Werkz
06 I’ll Write the Hook
07 We Can Go
08 Round 1
09 Trust Me
10 Tha Wolf
11 It’s Mine!
12 I Bet U Think This Track Is About U!!
13 Talaban
14 It Never Rains [ft. DJ Twan]
15 Day and Night Time

Jazz Monroe is a music and culture writer based in London. His work also appears in The Guardian, The Independent, and elsewhere.
